title: Data Quality
description: Daily cross-domain pipeline error rate, event volume, and active user counts (gold_data_quality_daily).

panels.title: Pipeline Error Rate (%)
panels.description: Percentage of all telemetry events with status=error per day across all domains.  A rising rate suggests a broken pipeline stage.

targets.rawSql: SELECT event_date::TIMESTAMP AS time, error_rate_pct AS "Error Rate %" FROM gold_data_quality_daily ORDER BY event_date

panels.title: Active Users
panels.description: Number of distinct pipeline users generating at least one telemetry event per day.  Useful for adoption and seat tracking.

targets.rawSql: SELECT event_date::TIMESTAMP AS time, active_users AS "Active Users" FROM gold_data_quality_daily ORDER BY event_date
